column2: Segment the pancreas from surrounding tissues in this 3D image ensuring accurate delineation of organ boundaries for precise diagnosis and treatment planning. Utilize advanced segmentation techniques such as region growing or level-set methods to achieve reliable pancreas segmentation while minimizing errors and artifacts.

Develop customized segmentation pipelines that combine intensity-based thresholding machine learning algorithms and post-processing techniques to achieve robust pancreas segmentation and improve diagnostic accuracy.
